>>When infrared radiation emitted from earth is reflected back to the earth by gases in the atmosphere, this is referred to as:<< (x) the greenhouse effect () natural climate change () anthropogenic climate change () season climate variation
[explanation] The greenhouse effect refers to the phenomenon in which infrared radiation emitted from earth is reflected back to the earth by gases in the atmosphere (known as greenhouse gases). [explanation]
